tickets.subject: Fwd: Not Receiving 49ers Emails
tickets.description:
Please correct this.

Sent from my iPhone

Begin forwarded message:

From: "Lohmann, Brandon" <brandon.lohmann@49ers-smc.com<mailto:brandon.lohmann@49ers-smc.com>>
Date: April 24, 2018 at 5:34:58 PM PDT
To: "mgullixson@apr.com<mailto:mgullixson@apr.com>" <mgullixson@apr.com<mailto:mgullixson@apr.com>>
Subject: Not Receiving 49ers Emails

Hello Mary,

It has come to my attention that you are not currently receiving our season ticket member email communications. Our marketing department has looked into the issue and identified that your email provider has put a block on emails from us. At this time, we do not have a fix on our end to reestablish having the emails come through to you. Our recommendation is for you to update the email address on file to use a different domain. You can also reach out to your IT department, if this is a work email address, and see if they can do anything to unblock our communications.

If you would like to change the email address on file for your account, you can login to your online account manager at www.49ers.com/myaccount<http://www.49ers.com/myaccount> to edit or reply to this email with the updated address to use.


Please let me know if there is anything else we can do for you at this time.

BRANDON LOHMANN
Manager, Premium Services
Forty Niners Stadium Management Company
T 408.579.4442<tel:408.579.4442>  |  M 408.731.0095<tel:408.731.0095>
Levi's® Stadium
4900 Marie P. DeBartolo Way<x-apple-data-detectors://0/3>
Santa Clara, CA 95054<x-apple-data-detectors://0/3>

––––––––––––––––––––––––

[cid:image001.png@01D30562.6F5E6EF0]

FAITHFUL THEN, FAITHFUL NOW
LevisStadium.com<http://www.levisstadium.com/>

We are excited to announce that we’ve secured the rights for BNY Mellon Club Members to purchase their exact same seats as part of a National Championship BNY Club Ticket Package.












Purchase Your BNY Mellon Club Seats Now!
2019 College Football Playoff National Championship

[Purchase Tickets]<http://ls.49ers.com/Umnp01O0gA0BVu009Y000O2>Deadline: Tuesday, May 1




The off-season program is officially underway and we are one step closer to the return of football! The 2018 NFL schedule comes out tonight and as the calendar turns to 2019, Levi's® Stadium will be center-stage as the host of the biggest game in college football: the 2019 College Football Playoff National Championship, played on Monday, January 7, 2019.

We are excited to announce that we’ve secured the rights for BNY Mellon Club Members to purchase their exact same seats as part of a National Championship BNY Mellon Club Ticket Package. As a BNY Mellon Club Member, you have exclusive access to your seat locations, before we go on sale to the general public.

Tickets packages start at $4,000 and include the following exclusive benefits:


[mhtml:file://C:\Users\Brandon.Lohmann\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\Content.Outlook\91TM0KBM\email.mht!http://www.levisstadium.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/CFP-Bullet-Pointer.jpg]

50-yard line, 100-level, Premium Club Seats at Levi’s® Stadium


[mhtml:file://C:\Users\Brandon.Lohmann\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\Content.Outlook\91TM0KBM\email.mht!http://www.levisstadium.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/CFP-Bullet-Pointer.jpg]

Access to a private, all-inclusive BNY Mellon Club experience throughout the game


[mhtml:file://C:\Users\Brandon.Lohmann\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\Content.Outlook\91TM0KBM\email.mht!http://www.levisstadium.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/CFP-Bullet-Pointer.jpg]

VIP pregame, all-inclusive tailgate party at Levi’s® Stadium


[mhtml:file://C:\Users\Brandon.Lohmann\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\Content.Outlook\91TM0KBM\email.mht!http://www.levisstadium.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/CFP-Bullet-Pointer.jpg]

Preferred gameday parking


[mhtml:file://C:\Users\Brandon.Lohmann\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\Content.Outlook\91TM0KBM\email.mht!http://www.levisstadium.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/CFP-Bullet-Pointer.jpg]

Dedicated, VIP entrance into the Stadium


[mhtml:file://C:\Users\Brandon.Lohmann\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\INetCache\Content.Outlook\91TM0KBM\email.mht!http://www.levisstadium.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/CFP-Bullet-Pointer.jpg]

Access to College Football Playoff Fan Central (Fri-Sun)


If you are interested in purchasing your BNY Mellon Club seats for this event, please view your invoice here<http://ls.49ers.com/Umnp01O0gA0BVu009Y000O2> or click the link below and complete payment by Tuesday, May 1. After Tuesday, May 1, your seats will be available for the general public to purchase.

<http://ls.49ers.com/Umnp01O0gA0BVu009Y000O2>[Purchase Tickets >]<http://ls.49ers.com/Umnp01O0gA0BVu009Y000O2>

tickets.subject: FW: akwcummins, review and agree to our updated Terms and Data Policy
tickets.raw_subject: FW: akwcummins, review and agree to our updated Terms and Data Policy
tickets.description:
Is this legit?

Thx

Anne

 

From: Instagram [mailto:no-reply@mail.instagram.com]
Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2018 11:04 PM
To: Anne Cummins <acummins@apr.com>
Subject: akwcummins, review and agree to our updated Terms and Data Policy

 

 

Please take a moment to review some changes to our Terms and Data Policy. Let us know if you agree to them to continue using Instagram.

Updates to Our Terms and Data Policy

Your Instagram experience isn't changing, and you still own your photos and videos. We are giving you better ways to access your data and understand how it's used.

Instagram has been a part of Facebook since 2012, and we're making some corporate changes. Going forward, our terms will reflect that Facebook Inc. is responsible for Instagram. The Instagram app and the way we process data are not changing.

Our Terms are now more clear about the service we provide, and what we expect from every member of our community to keep Instagram a safe place for everyone. Here are some updates we want to make sure you know about:

We updated our intellectual property licenses, but your rights aren't changing. You still own your photos and videos.

We updated how we use information to show activity on Instagram, so people can see when you've interacted with an ad the same way we do on a regular post.

We also have a new Data Policy that explains how data is collected, shared and used in the Facebook Products, including Instagram. The policy addresses newer features like stories, direct messaging, activity status and the creative tools in our cameras. We wanted to make sure you knew about this new information in the policy.

We receive different kinds of information from your device, like how you tap and scroll, which can help distinguish humans from bots and detect fraud.

We can use and share information for research, especially in ways that help us keep our community safe on Instagram, like to understand and prevent bullying and harassment.

The policy has more information about what we collect from your activity and our partners, how we connect information across the Facebook Companies and personalize your experience, including ads.

We provide ads without telling advertisers who you are. The policy has more information about what we do share with advertisers and partners. We never sell your data.

Because the policy also covers Facebook, it includes information about facial recognition. We don't use facial recognition technology on Instagram. If we introduce it, we'll let you know and give you a choice.

 

Agree

 (https://www.instagram.com/accounts/row_tos_confirm/meva3k/FtHyf1MDns/)

 

 

Read the Full Terms (https://help.instagram.com/581066165581870) and Data Policy (https://help.instagram.com/519522125107875)

 

   

© Instagram, 1 Hacker Way, Menlo Park, CA 94025

tickets.subject: Fwd: Fixer Upper for sale by REVestors: 230 Dale Dr, San Jose, CA 95127
tickets.raw_subject: Fwd: Fixer Upper for sale by REVestors: 230 Dale Dr, San Jose, CA 95127
tickets.description:
Hello IT Friends,

Is it possible to block this incoming gmail address in my APR email address?
If so, please show me how-to.

Thanks, in advances! :)

Kindest regards,
 Service of Distinction
Vincent Choi / Realtor / BRE 01171034
Alain Pinel Realtors
12772 Saratoga-Sunnyvale Road
Saratoga, CA 95070
7-Day 408-206-3466<tel:(408)%20206-3466>
www.vkchomes.com<http://www.vkchomes.com>
CONFIDENTIALITY:  This email message, and any attachments thereto, is covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act, 18 U.S.C. § 2510-2521, and may be privileged.  The contents of this message, including any attachments, are for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and contains a private, confidential communication protected by the attorney client privilege and the attorney work product doctrine.  Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution of this email is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply email and destroy all copies of the original message. Thank you.






Begin forwarded message:

From: Jake Zhang <jakezhang@gmail.com<mailto:jakezhang@gmail.com>>
Subject: Fixer Upper for sale by REVestors: 230 Dale Dr, San Jose, CA 95127
Date: April 24, 2018 at 10:00:12 PM PDT
To: Vincentc <vincentc@apr.com<mailto:vincentc@apr.com>>

Dear Vincent Choi,

Here is a hard to find investor's dream deal. For some reason, we decided to sell it in the middle of rehab, take over the project and finish it. Huge corner lot. Permit applied and approved. New roof. All new material inside the house included. AS IS sale.

http://www.revestorsllc.com/property/230-dale-dr-san-jose-ca-95127/<https://jakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/Redirect?ukey=1VYHXSdt3o7TIK4QvbiWqJxR0-K_AqRTa27F_UI27Rjw-0&key=YAMMID-32412172&link=http%3A%2F%2Frevestorsllcseller.oncarrot.com%2Fproperty%2F230-dale-dr-san-jose-ca-95127%2F>

The reason you receive this email is because we have identified you are an active and top performing agent in our local area. As an active real estate investment company, we want to explore the possibility of working with you to bring us your Pre-Listed or Off-Market Listings. If they are profitable deals, we will buy them for all cash and close in a few days. Plus after we rehab the houses, we will re-list them with you, so you are expecting to get a total of 2, 3 or even 4 commissions on only one deal.

What is the potential income if you bring a good Pre-Listed or Off-Market Listings to us?

$100k.

YES! By bringing us a good Pre-Listed or Off-Market deal.

REVestors LLC, also known as "We Buy Your House in 7 Days" company, is a local cash house buyer in San Jose, California. Since 2008, we have been buying, rehabbing and reselling  300+ houses for profits in local San Jose and its surrounding areas, and earned good reputation and trust in our local real estate community. We consistently work with top real estate agents like you to bring us motivated sellers that need to sell their houses fast with cash offer.

Can it be real to make $100k commission from just ONE house??

YES!

Example 1: ML81683074 - 2285 Lenox Place, Santa Clara 95054
The agent brought us this off-market listing. She made $69k ($1,150,000 x 6%) commission when she brought the house to us, and another $39,875 ($1,595,000 x 2.5%) after we rehabbed the house and re-listed with her. She made a total $108,875 commission from this ONE house.

Example 2: ML81685495 - 919 Almaden Avenue, Sunnyvale 94085
The agent brought us this off-market listing. She made $47,750 ($955,000 x 5%) commission when we bought the house, and another $38,637 ($1,405,000 x 2.75%) after we rehabbed the house and re-listed with her. She made a total $86,387 commission from this ONE house.

Do you also want to make $100k commission from just ONE house? Please bring us good Pre-Listed or Off-Market deals.

I am looking forward to having a chance to work with you soon.


Thank you!



Jake Zhang[X]

[cid:ii_jb2hrkq00_16046b10dabba0d2]
​[X]
Direct: 408-230-6566
Email: jake@REVestorsLLC.com<mailto:jake@REVestorsLLC.com>
Web: http://www.REVestorsLLC.com<https://jakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/Redirect?ukey=1VYHXSdt3o7TIK4QvbiWqJxR0-K_AqRTa27F_UI27Rjw-0&key=YAMMID-32412172&link=https%3A%2F%2Fjakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com%2FRedirect%3Fukey%3D1w_kMcnULL9ECkmQsQzRE4G-wBaI-69lKea8VIOsQIdU-0%26key%3DYAMMID-72337064%26link%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fjakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com%252FRedirect%253Fukey%253D1VYHXSdt3o7TIK4QvbiWqJxR0-K_AqRTa27F_UI27Rjw-0%2526key%253DYAMMID-07040252%2526link%253Dhttp%25253A%25252F%25252Fwww.revestorsllc.com%25252F>
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/REVestors<https://jakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/Redirect?ukey=1VYHXSdt3o7TIK4QvbiWqJxR0-K_AqRTa27F_UI27Rjw-0&key=YAMMID-32412172&link=https%3A%2F%2Fjakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com%2FRedirect%3Fukey%3D1w_kMcnULL9ECkmQsQzRE4G-wBaI-69lKea8VIOsQIdU-0%26key%3DYAMMID-72337064%26link%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fjakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com%252FRedirect%253Fukey%253D1VYHXSdt3o7TIK4QvbiWqJxR0-K_AqRTa27F_UI27Rjw-0%2526key%253DYAMMID-07040252%2526link%253Dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Fwww.facebook.com%25252Frevestors>
Twitter: https://twitter.com/REVestorsLLC<https://jakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/Redirect?ukey=1VYHXSdt3o7TIK4QvbiWqJxR0-K_AqRTa27F_UI27Rjw-0&key=YAMMID-32412172&link=https%3A%2F%2Fjakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com%2FRedirect%3Fukey%3D1w_kMcnULL9ECkmQsQzRE4G-wBaI-69lKea8VIOsQIdU-0%26key%3DYAMMID-72337064%26link%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fjakezhang-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com%252FRedirect%253Fukey%253D1VYHXSdt3o7TIK4QvbiWqJxR0-K_AqRTa27F_UI27Rjw-0%2526key%253DYAMMID-07040252%2526link%253Dhttps%25253A%25252F%25252Ftwitter.com%25252FREVestorsLLC>

P.S. SAVE THIS EMAIL FOR FUTURE REFERENCE
